means: （事实，秘密等）被人知道( transpire的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Excellent, everything is transpiring as the Awareness has foreseen.
sentence.Network_cn: 好极了, 一切都按照“意识”的预言进行.

sentence.Network_en: But, In the face of all that is transpiring, I realize how meager my knowledge is.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是, 当面对这突发一切时, 我才意识到自己的知识有多么贫乏.

sentence.Network_en: Several things will now appear less dark and mysterious than they did when they were transpiring.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些事情与它们刚刚发生时相比现在看来已不显得那麽模糊不清和神秘莫测了.

list.abs: (二)蒸腾的途径(或部位) 2.叶片蒸腾 1)角质层蒸腾 (cuticular transpiration) 2)气孔蒸腾 (stomatal transpiraton) 可占蒸腾总量的80-90%。是中生和旱生植物.
...植物在一定时间内,单位叶面积上散失的水量称为蒸腾速率,又称蒸腾强度, 蒸腾比率,transpiration ratio,植物每消耗1kg水所生产干物质的克数,或者说,植物在一定时间内干物质的累积量与同期所消.
...1,通过角质层的蒸腾叫角质蒸腾,cuticular transpiration,2,通过气孔的蒸腾叫气孔蒸腾,stomatal transpiration,气孔蒸腾是植物叶片蒸腾的主要形式, 4度量常用的蒸腾作用的定量指标有.
...蒸腾系数蒸腾系数（transpiration coefficient）又称需水量（water requirement） ，指植物合成1克干物质所蒸腾消耗的水分克数。蒸腾系.

entry.def: When it transpires that something is the case, people discover that it is the case.

example.ex: It transpired that Paolo had left his driving licence at home...
example.tran: 后来才知道保罗把驾照忘在家里了。

example.ex: As it transpired, the Labour government did not dare go against the pressures exerted by the City.
example.tran: 后来人们得知，工党政府不敢与伦敦金融界施加的压力相对抗。

entry.tran: 发生(有些讲英语的人认为该用法不正确)
entry.def: When something transpires, it happens. Some speakers of English consider this use to be incorrect.

example.ex: Nothing is known as yet about what transpired at the meeting.
example.tran: 会上到底发生了什么现在还没人知道。

auth_sentence.content: What we call "miraculous" is simply events transpiring at a deeper level of law than we normally experience.
auth_sentence.res_content: What we call "miraculous" is simply events transpiring at a deeper level of law than we normally experience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What we call "miraculous" is simply events transpiring at a deeper level of law than we normally experience.

auth_sentence.content: That scares them away, and if it gets really ugly I'll be able to tape at least some of what's transpiring.
auth_sentence.res_content: That scares them away, and if it gets really ugly I'll be able to tape at least some of what's transpiring.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That scares them away, and if it gets really ugly I'll be able to tape at least some of what's transpiring.
